text: Giuseppe Galasso (19 November 1929 â€“ 12 February 2018) was an Italian historian and politician. He was born in Rome. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1983 to 1994. Galasso died in Rome of prostate cancer on 12 February 2018 at the age of 88.Morto lo storico Giuseppe Galasso ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Politicians from Rome Category:Italian historians Category:Writers from Rome
